content: *this simple prayer shawl is a popular pattern for charity crafting cover pattern from the prayer shawl ministry reaching those in need copyright 2005 leisure arts copyright 2005 all rights reserved reproduced with permission lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 20281-c *chs-prayershawl pdf* gauge 5 v-sts and 7 row = 5-1/2 in 14 cm gauge swatch 6 w x 5-1/2 h 5 25 cm x 14 cm homespun 790-341 windsor 4 balls crochet hook - size k-10 5 6 5 mm see also ravelry prayer shawl / healing shawl #13779 1 worked in half_double_crochet 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/prayer-shawl---healing-shawl-13779-2
